noun.description: The action of making or agreeing to make an advance payment in order to receive or participate in something.
examples: the newsletter is available only on subscription

noun.description: A signature or short piece of writing at the end of a document.
examples: he signed the letter and added a subscription

origin: Late Middle English (in subscription (sense 2)): from Latin subscriptio(n-), from subscribere write below (see subscribe).
